description: Miami (AP) -- Authorities searched in the Bahamas on Tuesday for a small overdue plane with four people from the U.S. on board, including a prominent New York businesswoman and her two children.
title: Plane With New York CEO, 3 Others, Missing in Bahamas

author: Jay Croft and Sarah Jorgensen, CNN
description: The US Coast Guard confirmed Wednesday that debris found east of an island in the Bahamas is from an MU-2B plane, the same kind of plane that went missing Monday with four Americans aboard.
title: Coast Guard searches for plane crash survivors off Bahamas
